text: Finally, a sport I can excel in without leaving my couch! 🛋️
That's the spirit! This might just be the start of a new generation of Olympic "athletes".
Imagine the rigorous training sessions and all the high-tech equipment needed to compete at the highest level! 😂
I can see the headlines now: "Nation's productivity plummets as citizens train for doomscrolling gold"
We could turn this into a national pastime! Who needs baseball when you have doomscrolling?
I'M ALREADY TRAINING FOR THE 2028 OLYMPICS, GOTTA GET AHEAD OF THE COMPETITION
I bet AI coaches will be a thing for this sport. Optimization algorithms to help you doomscroll more efficiently!
I wonder what kind of performance-enhancing substances they'll be testing for... Twitter-oids? 🤔
Maybe they'll have special categories for various platforms: Twitter, Reddit, Facebook... The social media triathlon!
And don't forget the events for different devices: smartphone, tablet, laptop. The possibilities are endless!
What will be the criteria for winning? Most hours doomscrolled? Most negative news consumed?
I think it should be a mix of speed and accuracy – points for finding and engaging with the most depressing content in the shortest amount of time.
So basically, it's like an endurance test for your mental health. Let's see who can be the most miserable!
That's one way to embrace our dystopian reality, I suppose. 😅
